title: Industrial Electronic Metal Gothic Album "Doomed to Fail"
description: A Dark Evil Electronic Industrial Gothic Hybrid Instrumental Album (with Metal elements) containing 9 tracks to suite your specific scenes, boss fights, character themes or title sequences perfectly
longDescription:
Doomed to Fail. An Album by Eons After that contains 10 tracks (9 plus one Bonus) of Original Industrial Metal instrumental tracks with Electronic Sounds, Orchestral instruments, Gothic Choirs and World Percussion elements designed for Soundtrack, background and atmospheric purposes that incorporate big, chunky, aggressive, hard hitting, punchy, powerful, evil and dark haunting sounds to suite your specific scene, boss fight, character theme or title sequence perfectly.


Many of these songs have progressive buildup sections that add instrumental elements after 4,8 or 16 Loopable bars that creates a feeling of become darker, closer, scarier, revealing itself, etc, and would suite increasing levels of intensity, threat, attack, danger, etc.


The 8 Tracks all consists of the original and all the sections of each track in 2,4,8,16, etc, bar loops individualised to give multiple options and be looped seamlessly as required (196 Loops!!!)


Please also note, on the additional "Bonus" track "Fuelling Doom's Fire", has the original track and a Looped track with all the sections ready for editing.


If you purchase, please send me a message so I can add your game to my portfolio and give you free advertising in return. Thanks
